data.author: mosfet80
data.message:
Change upstream to fix build with clang and avoid patch command (#80)

* fix compile 

fix error: identifier '_GB' preceded by whitespace in a literal operator declaration is deprecated [-Werror,-Wdeprecated-literal-operator]
  684 |             constexpr std::size_t operator"" _GB(unsigned long long value) noexcept


Signed-off-by: mosfet80 <10235105+mosfet80@users.noreply.github.com>

* Update changelog

Signed-off-by: Miguel Company <miguelcompany@eprosima.com>

* Change upstream to eProsima fork to avoid patch command

Signed-off-by: Miguel Company <miguelcompany@eprosima.com>

---------

Signed-off-by: mosfet80 <10235105+mosfet80@users.noreply.github.com>
Signed-off-by: Miguel Company <miguelcompany@eprosima.com>

Revert #11

data.author: Miguel Company
data.message:
Revert "[6337] Allow foonathan_memory_vendor to behave as any other target under VC generator. (#11)"

This reverts commit eb152cafa1689f52697145a5a8f56a7e38301dd6.

data.author: MiguelBarro
data.message:
[6337] Allow foonathan_memory_vendor to behave as any other target under VC generator. (#11)

* Allow foonathan_memory_vendor to behave as any other target under VC generator.

VC Generator forces you to specify architecture (Win32 or x64) when the Buildsystem is generated (first stage), for example:

project > cmake -A x64 -B build64 .

then on the build (second stage) a config (Release, Debug, ...) is specified, for example:

project > cmake --build build64 --config Debug

as foonathan_memory_vendor was implemented once the project was generated for an architecture (x64 for example) no other architecture was allowed, for example the following command:

project > cmake -A Win32 -B build32 .

wouldn't generate any vcxproj because it identifies that this project was already generated (unfortunately for the wrong architecture).

data.author: Álvaro Molinillo
data.message:
Patch to change install directories if a variable is set [6154] (#5)

* Refs #5961. Apply patch over original repo CMakeLists.txt to change
install directories. Only if INSTALLER_PLATFORM is set.
Also added cmake config file to redirect to the correct platfom cmake
config file when creating the installer.

* Refs #5961. Apply patch over original repo src/CMakeLists.txt to change
the name of the generated library depending on it is static or dynamic.
If it is static the library name will have the "lib" prefix.

* Refs #5961. Use BUILD_SHARED_LIBS variable as suggested.

*  Refs #5961. Remove vs2013 platform as suggested.
